snippet.title: XBOX 360 Hartacon Tactics - Developer Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Hartacon Tactics has been released for XBOX 360 and is now available on the marketplace!

Link here: http://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Games/XboxIndieGames?SortBy=ReleaseDate

Hartacon Tactics is a turn-based tactical RPG, featuring higly deterministc mechanics, beautiful hand-painted 2D art and deep gameplay.

Hire characters of unique classes, and wisely use their strengths, skills and weapons to defeat tough enemies as you travel through the continent of Kaus in the single-player campaign, or challenge other players in co-op local multiplayer battles.
